title: Additional Listing
text:

Mon, Oct 12, 2015, 09:13 BST - UK Markets close in 7 hrs 17 mins Additional Listing Next Fifteen Communications Group plc (“Next 15” or the “Company”) Block Listing Application 
The Company provides notification that application has been made in respect of a block listing of 1,500,000 Ordinary Shares of 2.5 pence each in the Company (the “Block Listing Shares”). 
The 1,500,000 Block Listing Shares represent approximately 2.29% of the current issued share capital of the Company. 
The Block Listing Shares represent options over Ordinary Shares and performance share awards of Ordinary Shares that were granted under the Next Fifteen Communications Group plc Long Term Incentive Plan. On exercise of the options or vesting of the performance share awards, the shares will be issued credited as fully paid and will rank pari passu with the existing Ordinary Shares in issue. 
Admission of the Block Listing Shares is expected to occur on 13 October 2015.
